tstt_dialog_orkleader_default.message: Me Stronkest Fiter here. Me CRUSH all laik coboltz.

responses.message: I respect that. You are stronker.

tstt_dialog_orkleader_default.title: Lurtz, Cold-Blooded Leader of the Uruk-Hai

tstt_dialog_training_mans_default.message: A horde of Goblins and their filthy companions have taken over the Scrobold Warren nearby. It became a lot more difficult for a Freshmans like myself. You better be careful.
